text.*:
Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF5[1]
Overview
Type Micro Four Thirds System
Lens
Lens Micro Four Thirds System mount
Sensor/Medium
Sensor 4/3 type MOS ('Live MOS sensor')
Maximum resolution 12.1 megapixels
ASA/ISO range max ISO 12800[2]
Viewfinder
Viewfinder None (no accessory hotshoe)
General
Rear LCD monitor 920k dot screen[2]
Battery 940 mAh 7.2v Lithium-Ion rechargeable battery
Dimensions 108x67x37 mm[2]

Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF5 is the ninth camera in Panasonic's Lumix G-series adhering to the Micro Four Thirds System (MFT) design standard.

See also[edit]

  • Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF1
  • Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF2
  • Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF3

References[edit]

  1. ^ "DMC-GF5 | PRODUCTS | LUMIX | Digital Camera | Panasonic Global". Panasonic.net. Retrieved 2013-03-27. 
  2. ^ a b c "Panasonic DMC-GF3 vs DMC-GF5 - Our Analysis". Snapsort.com. Retrieved 2013-03-27.
